body:
@raysams Nah, the artist was living in korea where pornography is outlawed pretty heavily and they dropped off the map after a few months of posting these on 4chan 
I vaguely remember them being concerned about their family finding out and talking about suicide :/
Is there a continuation of this?
I have mixed feelings about this, not because it’s gay (I’ve already accepted I’m into that kinda stuff) but because of how unhealthy the relationship seems.
thats how you tame a bully LOL
